testimonials.name: Siyamanga Zweli
testimonials.describe: Kgodisho is a highly thought intellectual, who enjoys helping around. She is always positive with great enthusiasm. She is always excited to take on new challenges. Her passion for technology shows in her work. She is incredibly motivated and has great communication and leadership skills. Any company would be lucky to have her on their team.

testimonials.name: Amy Pieterse
testimonials.describe: Working with Kgodisho was a pleasure. Her ability to communicate complex ideas in a clear and concise manner made our collaboration seamless. She was always available to answer questions and offer suggestions. She has strong attention to detail and her passion for visually appealing websites was evident in every project she delivered.

testimonials.name: Abdul-Azeez Kemp
testimonials.describe: Kgodisho is an honorouable student and person, she interprets information very well and gets her point across clearly. She works well in a team and helps her peers to the best of her ability. She is kind , open -minded , creative and a problem-solver, she will be an asset to any company or field she works in.

testimonials.name: Sibusiso Dyan
testimonials.describe: I have had the pleasure of working alongside Kgodisho during her time at Life Choices Academy. Kgodisho is great at problem solving and has shown great determination in mastering the concepts covered in the program.

testimonials.name: Taflynne Peterson
testimonials.describe: Kgodisho is always willing to help and I am glad I've worked with her on projects as she is thorough and enthusiastic with her work

testimonials.name: Joel Mukanya
testimonials.describe: Kgodisho is very well-behaved, social, and dedicated; she enjoys working with her peers and works well on her project. She learned HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and VueJS. She will learn more in the coming months.
